Topic: Draw a fish in their habitat with labels.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw and label a fish and other living things in the ocean or a body of water.
The student can show and label water, air, and land resources needed by the fish and other living things in their habitat.
The student can represent the relationship between the fish and the water it needs to survive.
The student can illustrate the area where fish live, like a river, pond, lake, or ocean, and show the resources this environment provides.
The student can describe, through the drawing, how the system of the fish's habitat works together to provide for the needs of the fish and other living things.
